nodes.text: Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures Volume 5
Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures Volume 5 is the fifth volume in the Clone Wars Adventures series.

Inspired by the Cartoon Network's Clone Wars cartoons, this comic-book series uses the television show as a jumping-off point to tell new stories of heroism and villainy in the same stripped-down visual style.
Journeys into the heart of darkness to save an Ewok village!
Learns firsthand of the sacrifices the Separatists will make for their cause!
Infiltrates a dangerous world to rescue a friend!
Gets caught in the crosshairs of Order 66!
Incredible action, hot art, and lightning-fast pacing are coming your way in this exciting take on the Star Wars galaxy!
Strap in for another tour through the highly charged Clone Wars Adventures!

As the fires of the Clone Wars burn across the galaxy, heroes on both sides of the conflict emerge, and no matter what the outcome, the galaxy will be forever changed. Presenting four more pulse-racing tales of knock-down, drag-out action and adventure, all told in the same stripped-down stylization as Cartoon Network's micro-series.
